sentences.english: Pieces of cotton in HANGING COFFIN discovered the first kind of cotton textiles in China.
sentences.chinese: 棺中的棉布殘片是中國迄今發現最早的棉紡織品實物。

sentences.english: Stabilized body care products, household products, textiles and fabrics.
sentences.chinese: 穩定的身體護理品，家用製品，紡織品和織物。
你注意到這些紡織品了嗎？

sentences.english: Your consignment of 30c/s textiles arrived in good condition.
sentences.chinese: 貴公司寄售之30箱紡織品已安然抵達。

sentences.english: The different origins of unlevel dyeing (color streaks) as quality deficiency of textiles are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了作爲紡織品質量問題的染色不勻的不同起因。

sentences.english: Im a foreign trade worker of the China National Textiles Import and Export Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 我是中國紡織品進出口公司的業務員。

sentences.english: The fabrics are merchandised through a network of dealers.
sentences.chinese: 這些紡織品是通過經銷網點銷售的。

sentences.english: The normal dry cleaning and laundering applied to textile articles sterilises them satisfactorily .
sentences.chinese: 通常對紡織品的乾洗和水洗能夠有效殺菌消毒。

sentences.english: LTD , SANHUAN HOME FABRICS is a towel factory in Gaoyang County, Hebei Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 是以出口爲主的大型現代化家用紡織品生產企業。

sentences.english: The floor was stacked high with bales of dry goods.
sentences.chinese: 地板上高高地堆放着許多包紡織品。

sentences.english: They decided to become free traders, specializing in textiles and gemstones.
sentences.chinese: 他們決定當自由行商，專做紡織品和寶石生意。

sentences.english: From the context of the text I find the next pretext for selling the textile.
sentences.chinese: 我從課文的前後關係中找到賣紡織品掂一個藉口。

sentences.english: Your consignment of 30 cases textile arrived in excellent condition.
sentences.chinese: 貴公司寄售的30箱紡織品已安然運達。

sentences.english: They infiltrate into and promote mutually other velevant industries, and become one of signs of the developed degree of national economy.
sentences.chinese: 產業用紡織品是一個國家經濟發達程度的標誌之一。

sentences.english: This material is a mixture fabric of pure wool and plush.
sentences.chinese: 這種料子是純羊毛與長毛絨的混紡織品。

sentences.english: All the textile prices have been marked down.
sentences.chinese: 所有的紡織品都減價了。
